p: Minimum biofilm inhibitory concentration of forming biofilms - In this experiment, minimum concentration of C. verum leaf oil required to inhibit the biofilm formation by 50% (compared to negative control) was determined. Biomass/viability of formed biofilms in the presence of essential oil was determined using XTT viability assay. Fig. 3 showed the percentage reduction of XTT metabolic activity of forming biofilms compared to negative control.
